p: For hundreds of years, natural products, such as medicinal plants, have been the basis for the treatment of various diseases [ 1]. In screening natural products for the pharmacological activities, assessment, and evaluation of the toxic characteristics of a natural product extract or compound are usually an initial step. Regardless of the pharmacological beneficial effects of HS, detailed knowledge about the poisonous effect of this famous herb is lacking. Hence, the current study was undertaken to evaluate and focus on the acute and subacute toxicity of HS in mice and rats.
